operations.name: Get Journal Entries by System ID and Element Type
operations.notes:
Journal Entries contain several different types of comments or data.  

The Journal Element parameter references this type. Common values are:
-work_notes
-comments
- approval_history


The Element ID parameter is the sys_id of the related record such as the Incident record
